tool.name: Associations
tool.command: if [ $type eq 'find' ]; then curl -X GET --header 'Accept: application/json' 'https://api.monarchinitiative.org/api/association/$type?rows=$rows&fetch_objects=true&subject=$subject' > $output elif [ $type eq 'from' ]; then curl -X GET --header 'Accept: application/json' 'https://api.monarchinitiative.org/api/association/$type/$subject?rows=$rows&fetch_objects=true' > $output elif [ $type eq 'to' ]; then curl -X GET --header 'Accept: application/json' 'https://api.monarchinitiative.org/api/association/$type/$object?rows=$rows&fetch_objects=true' > $output elif [ $type eq 'between' ]; then curl -X GET --header 'Accept: application/json' 'https://api.monarchinitiative.org/api/association/$type/$subject/$object?rows=$rows&fetch_objects=true' > $output fi
tool.help: Pulls data from Monarch Initiative BioLink API web services as JSON. https://api.monarchinitiative.org/api/
